name: Cambodian Straight (3 Bundles) 5A
description:
Bougie Hair Boutique Collection brings you Hailing from the roots of Cambodia, this form of virgin hair upholds its uniqueness in its baby fine hair shaft. This presents a soft and silky hair density, mainly suited to achieving long, layered locks. Cambodian hair has a slightly coarse texture and is a good match with African American hair.
 Our Virgin Cambodian Straight Hair is the highest quality Cambodian human hair on the market. The very best quality hair available in the marketplace. Bougie Hair Boutique guarantees that the hair you purchase will be of the highest quality without harmful processing and chemicals. We noticed a lot of the human hair offered in the market claims to be 100% human, however through scrutiny and observation a lot of it is not. Most manufacturers are using toxic chemical treatments and using silicone coating to make their hair appear to be a higher quality along with cutting the hair with synthetics, animal and low quality filler strands to cut costs. Bougie Hair Boutique is guaranteed to be 100% VIRGIN REMY CUTICLE HAIR and will not tangle, will last longer, and look more natural than other hair being offered. All of our bundles are full and ultra beautiful.
 
Bougie Hair Boutique brings you our Cambodian Straight extension. Our Cambodian hair can be dyed, into any color that you desire, straightened & cut. After washing hair will come back to it's natural state, allowing you to be as Bougie as you want to be! Our Virgin Cambodian Straight Hair is available in a natural off Black 1B  and will last well up to 1-2 years with proper care and maintenance.
 
Each bundle of our beautiful hair is:
 
3.5 ounces per bundle 
100% Virgin Human Hair 
Reusable 
Single Drawn Hair 
Grade 5A Quality 
Tangle-Free 
Full Cuticle 
Minimal to No Shedding (Please use a weft sealant if wefts will be cut)
 Micro-Machine Wefted 

All of our hair is sold in 3.5 ounces. It takes 6 to 8 ounces for a full weave, or two bundles, however, for lengths 14 inches or more we recommend 12 ounces, or 3-4 bundles for a full weave.
 
FREE SHIPPING Please note that Shipping including processing takes 5-10 business days [does NOT include weekends or holidays]. Please allow a total of 5-10 Days to receive your products. Available shipping will be USPS, included a delivery confirmation & Tracking #. Tracking # will be emailed after your product/s have been processed & mailed. Please make sure we have your correct address. Not responsible for incorrect addresses. At this time Overnight shipping is not available.
